text: Arizona Colt Returns () is a 1970 Italian Spanish western movie directed by first time director Sergio Martino and starring Anthony Steffen, Marcella Michelangeli, Aldo Sanbrell. == Other websites == * Category:1970 movies Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:Italian Western (genre) movies Category:Spanish Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Sergio Martino
title: Arizona Colt Returns
